[Information]

Additional Information:

  • How to Care: Hand wash only. Hang dry, don't use dryer.
  • For 1 piece table skirt only. Tablecloth and decorations are not included.
  • All table skirts come with velcro on top for attachment to clips. (CLIPS ARE SOLD SEPARATELY)
  • Uses: Wedding, Birthday, Party, Event, Banquest, Restaurant Decoration

Guideline to choosing the right size:

14ft Skirts - Covers 3 sides on a 6ft x 2 1/2ft banquet table ( similar to the ones you find in Costco) - 10 clips recommended

17ft Skirts - Covers 4 sides on a 6ft x 2 1/2ft banquet table ( similar to the ones you find in Costco) - 15 clips recommended
Covers 3 sides on a 8ft x 2 1/2ft banquet table

21ft Skirts- Covers 4 sides on a 8ft x 2 1/2ft banquet table - 20 clips minimum needed - 24 clips recommended

entry.summary:

Thickness: 135 GSM
1 Piece, Seamless Design
Hemmed edges for an exquisite look
Stain and Wrinkle resistant
All sizes are approximate measurements
Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.

[Information]

Silky Smooth Satin Tablecloth

Silky, smooth, and shiny satin always inspires people; there is an overwhelming charm and sophistication that this imperial fabric exudes. This attribute makes it a number one choice for decoration, embellishing and ornamenting. Our supreme quality Satin Tablecloths are fashioned with sublime refinement and extra smoothness to create one of a kind table linen for those special events that call for an extra dash of swanky urbanity and a red carpet treatment.

Royal Look & Effect

Spread these shimmering sheets atop your drab tables and plain table tops to create a perfect celebratory mood that will leave your guests in a complete awe of such a festal decoration. Oozing royal feel and luster, our Satin Tablecloths are ideal to give your plain tables and tablescapes a quick glamorous twist. Elevate the elegance of your tables manifold at wedding, birthday, holiday dinner, Christmas feast, and special events  by draping with these lush spreads.

     

Premium Quality

Dress your tables to the nines with our durable, reusable and totally adorable Satin Tablecloths that will give your guests an instant esteemed feel and royal treatment during your event. Fashioned from premium quality silky satin, these tablecloths can be used again and again to spruce your tables up without losing their regal luster and seamless sheen.


Additional Information:

  • Quantity: 1 Tablecloth
  • Material: Satin
  • Color: Hunter Emerald Green
  • Size: 60"x126"
  • Thickness: 135 GSM
  • 1 Piece, Seamless Design
  • Hemmed edges for an exquisite look
  • Stain and Wrinkle resistant
  • How to Care: Machine washable with Cold water
  • For Tablecloth only, decorations not included
  • Uses: Wedding, Party, Event, Banquet, Decoration

Linen Care Instructions

Hemmed edges for an exquisite look
1 pc, Seamless Design

[Information]

Our crinkle taffeta tablecloths have an undeniable and unsurpassed charm that makes simple items look highly fashionable and modish.  Spread it atop your dreary tables or plain, lackluster table covers to achieve the excellence of class and vibrancy. The lovely crinkles accented all over the surface coupled with the impeccable metallic glint of lustrous taffeta will impart an imperial sublimity to your banquet or wedding tables.

Let this exquisite tablecloth enchant the entire ambiance of your special event with its seamless luster and upscale look. Combining the glistening luster of premium quality taffeta with the classy appeal of crinkle design, we present these elegant tablecloths to augment the beauty of your tables.

Create a perfect harmony of elegance and style by complementing these tablecloths with matching taffeta chair covers, table runners, table skirts, chair skirts, chair caps and sashes. 

Additional Information:

  • How to Care: Hand wash, Hang dry only.
  • For Tablecloths only, decorations not included
  • Uses : Wedding, Party, Event, Banquet, Decoration

[Information]

Durability of high quality PVC (Polyvinyl Chloride) material is combined with the jazzy appeal of chic chevron design in these Waterproof Tablecloth to give you an absolute luxury for your upcoming catering or culinary event.  Perfect for setting an elegant table at your picnic, banquets, holiday parties, or for casual eateries, our heavy duty plastic vinyl tablecloths are thick enough to give your tables all the protection required. No need to spend your quality time and efforts on cleaning and ironing the tablecloths. These plastic table cloths are an ideal choice for outdoor/ indoor parties, birthday bashes, banquets and other culinary events. From the huge array of exciting colors available, choose the color that complements your event's theme.

Multi-Use

These table covers are an ideal choice for any occasions. Speed up cleaning so you can turn tables faster! You'll never have to waste time and money laundering linen table covers again.

Decorative

Aside from its elegance, it effectively repels water, making it ideal for protecting tables from spills. You'll never have to worry about juice or wine spilling across the table again.

Durable

Our Waterproof Tablecloth is made from high quality vinyl which gives you superior strength and durability and also provides the convenience of disposability that your events require.

These accident resistant heavy duty plastic table cloths are sturdy enough to avoid tears and rips, and an ideal choice for outdoor/ indoor parties, birthday bashes, banquets and other culinary events. We offer these durable, disposable and upscale quality plastic Waterproof Tablecloth to solve the budgetary challenges usually faced by professional party planners, family reunion organizers, and themed birthday party planners.

    Multi-Use

    These table covers are an ideal choice for any occasions. Speed up cleaning so you can turn tables faster! You'll never have to waste time and money laundering linen table covers again.

    Decorative

    Aside from its elegance, it effectively repels water, making it ideal for protecting tables from spills. You'll never have to worry about juice or wine spilling across the table again.
